author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: The Blockchain Group Adds 182 Bitcoin, Lifts BTC Holdings to Over $170M
description: The company says it achieved a 1,173% BTC yield this year as it keeps on accumulating bitcoin.
content:
The Blockchain Group (ALTBG), a Paris-listed tech firm that brands itself as Europes first bitcoin 
 treasury company, said it bought 182 BTC for 17 million euros ($19.6 million), bringing its total… [+1350 chars]
